Title: 37330 - Top # Games That Are Better On Your Computer
Direction: 675 words; List 4-8 games that are better to play on a laptop than any other device. Consider discussing games that are specifically designed for laptops versus apps for tablets, games for systems such as Playstation, and apps for smartphones. Direct this article toward young adults and young professionals who likely use a laptop often. Ideas may include games designed for both regular and gaming laptops. Naturally incorporate the AT and link when mentioning gaming laptops.
Client Comment: Example AT: a gaming laptop from Lenovo

Title: 37331 - Top # Accessories for Gaming Laptops
Direction: 675 Words; List 4-8 of the best accessories for gaming laptops. Make sure the accessories are relevant for PC laptops and don't focus on any Mac devices. Ideas may include racing wheels, head sets, speakers, and a gaming mouse. This article should be directed at young adults and young professionals who use laptops primarily. This article should also highlight the attributes of Lenovo and their variety of laptops. Naturally the AT and link when mentioning the Lenovo laptops.
Client Comment: Example AT: Lenovo's wide variety of laptops

Title: 37336 - Getting Your Team Ready for the Fantasy Football Playoffs
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 tips for getting your fantasy football team ready for the playoffs. You can include the anchor text and link when mentioning using your 2-in-1 laptop to watch the games as well as set up your line up for your fantasy team. Your audience consists of sports lovers and people who are interested in fantasy sports.
Client Comment: Example AT: best 2-in-1 laptops from Lenovo
